segments.text: Okay Rebecca , well I think you ’ Ve given me a clear impression of your positive qualities , but let ’ s talk a little bit about your weaknesses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , well it ’ s always more difficult to describe them isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely , but if you had to pinpoint one weakness what would it be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well as I mentioned before , I do tend to get frustrated if I don ’ t see progress in my work or career . I suppose I ’ m quite a restless character . My father always taught me to be a high achiever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So would you say if things don ’ t go your way at work it could easily get you down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , in a way yes . But I must say that even if I ’ m not completely happy in my work I always give 110 % I would never shirk my responsibilities . I suppose sometimes I expect too much too soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you know journalism is a highly competitive world , so you do need to keep pushing yourself it ’ s true . Okay , well let ’ s move on to talk about the job position here , shall we ?
segments.speaker: S1
